# unmarkText()

**Instance Method**

Unmarks the currently marked text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func unmarkText()
```

## Managing marked text

- **setMarkedText(_:selectedRange:)**: Inserts the provided text and marks it to indicate that it’s part of an active input session.

items.description: Inserts the provided text and marks it to indicate that it’s part of an active input session.
items.name: setMarkedText(_:selectedRange:)
